original_text: So the chief priests and the Pharisees gathered the council and said, “What are we to do? For this man performs many signs.
korean_text: 이에 대제사장들과 바리새인들이 공회를 모으고 이르되 이 사람이 많은 표적을 행하니 우리가 어떻게 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: So the chief priests and the Pharisees gathered the council
For this man performs many signs.
